name: Hoverboard Drift Sim Simulator- Tricky Hover Board
name_original: Hoverboard Drift Sim Simulator- Tricky Hover Board
description:
Hoverboard Drift Sim Simulator Racing Game is a fun way to test your hoverboard drifting skills on your device.

Hold on while you drift, race, and speed through the streets. Stay on long enough and you will be taken on an awesome adventure through different sceneries. There are cars and hazards on the road, so watch out for them unless you want to crash and burn. Your hoverboard will catch on fire unfortunately.

Goal is simple: Hold down on the device and drag with your thumb/finger. If you're up for the challenge, hold down with two fingers/thumbs. Avoid obstacles. How far can you drift?

Collect coins to unlock awesome new hoverboards. Better yet, have fun playing! Get those fingers ready!

[Features]
• 10 New Hoverboards to Unlock
• Beautiful Scenery to Explore: Water, Dirt, Forest, Sand Desert
• Collect Coins for New Hoverboards
• Beat your Friends and Family's High Score
• More coming soon..
